title: My Lucky Days
description: He was an up-and-coming country singer.She was the last girl you'd ever see in a bar.But one night, under those neon lights,Lucky and Katie found each other.Beginnings are always exciting.Always fun. Always hopeful.Katie was in her last year of college.Lucky was still playing local stages.She fell for his voice. She fell for his words.They fell in love.It was beautiful.But time changed their world.She was alone. He was on the road.Life happened.And that love was torn apart.Endings are always painful.Always heart wrenching.But not always final.One day, Lucky came back to Katie.And this is their story.Author Note: My Lucky Days is a Standalone Novel with sets of original song lyrics that read as poetry. New Adult & College / Contemporary Romance / Coming of Age / Second Chance Love Story.
author: S.D. Hendrickson
